description: This file defines a Quiz Page component for a Lightning.js based frontend application. It displays a quiz question with four options, manages user interaction (selecting options, navigating to next question), and handles routing to the results screen at the end.

classes.name: Quiz Page
classes.description: A Lightning.js component displaying quiz questions and options, managing quiz state, and routing to results.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the current quiz question and resets option backgrounds and selection.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects an option, updates background colors to highlight the selection.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next question, updates score if answer is correct, navigates to results if it was the last question.

calls: r.navigate('/results', { state: { score: this.$state.score, total: quiz.length } })
